member.name: M:EasyTravelWeb.Infrastructure.Logger.#cctor
member.summary: Specified to execute only when an instance of the class is created or a static member is referenced, and to execute only once per AppDomain. Given that check for the type being newly constructed needs to be executed whatever else happens, it will be faster than adding extra checking
